title: Roscoe Herb, DC - Flagstaff, AZ
description: 1 review of Roscoe Herb, DC "Herb has magic hands. His technique is gentle and he doesn't do that neck twisting jerk to get the neck back in line. He is intuitive and does a great job getting things to release in the back. i really appreciate the fact that he is gentle with the neck. He uses some technique by stretching the ankles in different positions to tell him what is going on in your back and neck. I trust him with my spine. He is real tuned in."
